subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Jim Courier will be leading the U.S. team, while Guy Forget, the longtime captain of France, has to deal with Gilles Simon, who has asked him not to offer tactical advice during matches.
snippet: Jim Courier will be leading the U.S. team, while Guy Forget, the longtime captain of France, has to deal with Gilles Simon, who has asked him not to offer tactical advice during matches.
